comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: From Wikipedia: The Porter's Bar Site is a Pre-Columbian archaeological site in Eastpoint, Florida. It is located two miles northeast of Eastpoint off U.S. 98/319. On January 23, 1975, it was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places.

comment.author: 53096108@N03
comment._content: Looks like my grandfather.  My Dad, Earl W. Brown was born on Porter's Bar in 1915.
